experience.title: My professional experience
experience.eqtek.description: Developing and maintaining case management system platform. Desigining and implementing short-term tailored projects for multiple clients from the British public sector and banking. Line management for a team of around ten devs and QAs, supporting communication with business and helping improving software development process.
experience.vsoft.description: Maintaining web application used by sales representatives to valuate complex insurance configurations.
experience.flightscope.pm-description: Evaluating, planning and designing architecture for multiple software projects. Coordinating communication between offices (Poland, South Africa and USA) and synchronizing co-operation of teams (project owners, UI designers, engineers, etc.). Prioritizing tasks and projects in regard to the available resources and the market demand. Managing a few small software teams on all levels.
experience.flightscope.leader-descriptio: On top of the current duties, designing software architecture, planning project development and overseeing the process as well as managing a team of a few developers.
experience.flightscope.dev-description: Developing and maintaining applications used by golfers (both professional and amateur) to improve their skills by analysing ball flight data provided by multiple sport radars.
education.title: My education
education.masters-desc: A diploma thesis on the subject "System for decoding Morse code with the use of software-defined radio" realized in the form of an application that performs real-time digital audio signal processing, written in C ++.
